alternative_parents.description: Organic aromatic compounds containing a biphenyl moiety, which is substituted at two or more ring positions by a bromine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Polybrominated biphenyls

alternative_parents.description: Polycyclic compounds containing a phenanthrene moiety, which is a tricyclic aromatic compound with three non-linearly fused benzene.
alternative_parents.name: Phenanthrenes and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a naphthalene moiety, which consists of two fused benzene rings.
alternative_parents.name: Naphthalenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl bromide functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl bromides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a bromine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organobromides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Compounds containing a pyrene moiety, which consists four fused benzene rings, resulting in a flat aromatic system.
class.name: Pyrenes

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as pyrenes. These are compounds containing a pyrene moiety, which consists four fused benzene rings, resulting in a flat aromatic system.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a pyrene moiety, which consists four fused benzene rings, resulting in a flat aromatic system.
direct_parent.name: Pyrenes

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

predicted_lipidmaps_terms: Diphenyl ethers, biphenyls, dibenzyls and stilbenes (PK1309)

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
